desc: Add skill limit to most mod items, add item physics and other mods that makes game harder
Add skill limit to items that missed
Add progressive boss mod to make vanilla boss harder.
Removed body temperature since it makes game nearly unplayable.
Lycanite mob rare subspecies no longer display boss hp bar by default and will despawn.
Lycanite mob event now respect light level, add sulfur dust furnace recipe.
Disabled AquaCulture's fish weight so it's possible to making automatic crafting system.
Mob spawner will spawn much more mobs now (farming possible)
